title: Selena Gomez is feeling nostalgic as she posts another adorable photo of herself as a little girl
text:
She posted a school photo of herself at about age 6 on Wednesday.

And on Friday, Selena Gomez was again feeling nostalgic as she took to Instagram to post another throwback photo of herself at about 2 years old.

The singer, now 27, poses with her hands placed at the side of her face and an adorable baby faced smile on her lips.

Throwback: Selena Gomez, 27, was feeling nostalgic on Friday as she took to Instagram again to post a photo of herself at about 2 years old

Mysterious: The former Wizards Of Waverly Place star included an obscure caption that read, 'I gave my all and they all know it' (pictured June 10 in New York)

In the photo, Gomez wears a plain black t-shirt with her curly black hair half up in a cute ponytail.

The former Wizards Of Waverly Place star included a mysterious caption that read, 'I gave my all and they all know it.'

Fans and stars alike flocked to the photo to comment on its wholesomeness.

'This is insanity. I need a moment,' Comedian Amy Schumer commented.

Baby-faced: Selena shared a picture of herself at about age 6 on Wednesday, looking bright eyed and bushy tailed for an elementary school picture day

Rise to fame: By 10, the child star (R) was already working on the TV show Barney with pal Demi Lovato (pictured in 2003 on Barney episode A Perfectly Purple Day)

Though the year of the photo is unknown, a baby faced smile reveals a mouthful of tiny baby teeth that have not yet wiggled loose to make way for adult teeth, which happens at about age 6.

In the photo posted on Wednesday, a baby faced smile reveals some new teeth growing in on both sides of little Gomez's mouth.

By 10, the child star was already working on the TV show Barney with pal Demi Lovato.

Just an hour after posting the throwback photo of her 2-year-old self, Gomez posted a promo for her new song Lose You To Love Me, which is coming out later this month.

Promo: Just an hour later, Gomez posted a promo for her new song Lose You To Love Me, which is coming out later this month

Dropping hints: In an appearance on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon back on June 11, The Heart Wants What it Wants hitmaker revealed that she's 'actually done' with her newest album

'I needed to lose you to love me. 10.23. Link in bio,' the Same Old Love singer wrote in the caption.

In an appearance on The Tonight Show back in June, The Heart Wants What it Wants hitmaker revealed that she's 'actually done' with her newest album.

'I have to do, like, a few finishing things with it, but I'm just relieved,' she told host Jimmy Fallon, continuing, 'It took me four years now to even feel at a good place with this album, and it's just because I had such huge moments that happened in my life personally that [it was like] how was I going to capture that and how was I actually going to feel good about what I was saying. So, I kept going and I'm relieved now.'

The actress and singer rose to fame in the mid-2000's with appearances on popular TV shows such as Hannah Montana and The Suite Life Of Zack And Cody before starring in Disney's Wizards of Waverly Place from 2007 to 2012.
description: Selena Gomez was again feeling nostalgic as she took to Instagram to post another throwback photo of herself at about 2 years old. The singer, 27, poses with her hands placed at the side of her face.
